summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WAConnect SaaS platform. All features working correctly: Landing page with professional footer, authentication (signup/login), session persistence, business creation wizard, and customer site templates (Restaurant and UniversalService). Backend APIs 100% passing (23/23 tests). Frontend fully functional.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with professional footer (Product, Resources, Company columns)
Social icons (Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube) present in footer
Session persistence - user stays logged in after page refresh
Restaurant template loads correctly for restaurant businesses
UniversalServiceTemplate loads correctly for service businesses
Enquiry modal opens and displays form fields
Booking modal opens and displays form fields
WhatsApp integration buttons present on customer sites
All 23 backend API tests passing (auth, business, products, bookings, orders, analytics)
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies in multiple components - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
Business creation form validation working correctly - shows 'Please fill out this field' for required fields
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test businesses via API: 'demorestaurant' (Restaurant template) and 'democonsulting' (UniversalService template)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features verified working: Landing page footer, auth flow, session persistence, business creation, customer site templates. Test businesses created: /site/demorestaurant and /site/democonsulting. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_api.py covers all API endpoints.

landing_page_footer.details: Professional SaaS-style footer with Product, Resources, Company columns and social icons (Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube)

authentication.details: Signup and login working correctly with JWT tokens

session_persistence.details: User stays logged in after page refresh - token stored in localStorage

dashboard.details: Dashboard loads after login showing 'No Business Yet' for new users

business_creation.details: 3-step wizard: Choose Template → Business Information → Additional Details

customer_site_templates.details: Restaurant template and UniversalServiceTemplate both loading correctly with all features (WhatsApp, Enquiry, Booking)
